name: tanks vs aliens (itch)
description:
1942 EARTH HAVE BEEN ATTACKED AND ONLY YOU

THE LAST TANKER ALIVE CAN STOP THEM.

WASD TO MOVE

MOUSE TO AIM AND LEFT CLICK TO SHOT

F TO USE MACHINE GUN

IN ORDER TO WIN YOU NEED TO CAPTURE THE RED CIRCLE IN ALL LEVELS WHEN THE COUNTER REACHES 30 YOU PROGRESS TO THE NEXT ONE GOOD LUCK ON THE BATTLEFIELD AND I HOPE YOU ENJOY.
